comment.author: 26881258@N07
comment._content: King Nikola I Petrovich of Montenegro (1860-1918) has been photographed by John Warwick Brooke standing with two officers beside a small fighter plane. King Nikola stands beside a two-seat reconnaissance machine, a Sopwith 1 1/2 Strutter (One and a half Strutter), no small single seat fighter here. Kees
